review: I bought this initially for my daughter and decided to test it out before I gave it to her. Now we have two in the house. I can't say anything bad about it. I've had to call about a few minor issues with Internet connectivity, but everyone I spoke to was polite and got my issue fixed that day. If you don't want to pay an expensive cable bill, Fire TV is the way to go. :)
